```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")

western <- "SELECT t.id, t.title, t.production_year,mi1.info AS genres
FROM title t
JOIN movie_info AS mi1 ON mi1.movie_id = t.id
WHERE t.kind_id = 1
AND mi1.info_type_id = 3
AND info = 'Western';
"
data <- db %>%
  dbGetQuery(western)

```
